metadata.name: GAEA {{TRIP}}
metadata.description:
MP4
3840 x 2160 
STEREO


::: ORDER + CHAOS :::

When nature, neon dust and black light collide…

Created during extreme weather events in the UK - the Spring snow storm and Summer heatwave of 2021. By fusing the artificial (neon dust, black light) and natural elements (earth, flora) these mutations which I call KALEIDESCAPES emerge. 

This artwork is named after one of many different translations of ‘Mother Earth.

Original music composed for {{TRIP}} artworks by Nick Abnett. Nick was the bassist in British electronic bands; Sabres of Paradise, The Aloof and Death in Vegas to name a few.
